short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects to VOIP Essential Recordings Dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By just clicking the extension, users of VoIP and its clients can visit a custom-generated url based on the url of the currently open tab, simplifying their work.
To put it simply, this plugin wraps around an API output and brings users to a GUI dashboard where the output is parsed and displayed to the user.
